summary: Found critical issues on loyalty points page: 1) Client-side exception causing page crash, 2) Token missing error in profile component, 3) offsetHeight null reference error, 4) Firebase notification permission errors. API calls are successful (200) but frontend crashes due to JavaScript errors. Need to add null checks and proper token handling.
current_status: Beauty Booking module testing in progress. Found critical JavaScript errors on loyalty points page causing complete page failure. Investigating profile component and DOM measurement issues.
